name: Gone Drunk
description:
Have you ever been in a situation when you had to rely on a friend’s shoulder to get through? Our game tells the journey of two friends, trying to arrive home on a dark night full of alcohol and danger, when only the streetlights show the blurry way.

It is a local co-op game, one player controls the Polish guy, who is responsible for navigating on a narrow street, and the other player controls the Hungarian guy, who is being carried, and can only shoot.

On the way home, they encounter various difficulties. They have to bypass parking cars, trash cans, dog poop, constructional sites, wandering into empty buildings, and avoid policemen chasing them with a teaser.

Different collectibles are waiting for you! Beer is your ammo, zubrowka and pálinka changes sounds depending on what you have just drank. Dynamical gameplay based on your blood alcohol level, be ready to experience a real night-out feature! If you drink too much, you lost the game!

Key features:

  • local co-op (with one controller)
  • responsive language feature
  • dynamical lights
  • drunkness feedback
